verses.roman:
tuṣṭa hañā prabhu tāṅre pāṭhāilā vṛndāvana
advaitera haste prabhura adbhuta bhojana

synonyms: tuṣṭa hañā—being very much pleased; prabhu—the Lord; tāṅre—him; pāṭhāilā—sent back; vṛndāvana—to Vṛndāvana; advaitera—of Advaita Ācārya; haste—in the hands; prabhura—of the Lord; adbhuta—wonderful; bhojana—feasting.
translation: Being pleased, the Lord sent Sanātana Gosvāmī back to Vṛndāvana. After that, He was fed wonderfully by the hands of Śrī Advaita Ācārya.
